bibl.title: Bacchylides' Spartan Dithyramb in the Light of Choral Projection. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Translated and modified fragment of a Polish MA thesis: Archaic and Early Classical Dithyramb: Theory, Practice and Ritual Contexts (Warsaw University, 2011). - Bacch. 20 (Maehler).
